short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates links to Hudu customers pages on Syncro Ticket and Customer pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The add-on will put a link to hudu on your SyncroMSP ticket page next to the "Customer Info" title. You must have an API key for both Syncro and Hudu. The Syncro API key needs to have "ticket view detail" and "customer view detail" permissions.
